tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
I Dental in one word is definitely a one stop solution for all the dental problems. I was referred to Dr.Anil through a friend of mine, I would undoubtedly say that I received the best of treatment which was explained in detail by Dr.Anil and later followed by an excellent treatment plan.
He is so well organised that he also provides you the exact timing of appointment and never makes his patients wait. The best part in his treatment is that he also oversees the making of the teeth himself which makes the fitting of teeth quite perfect. On the top of all this the price that he quotes for the treatment is very reasonable when compared with other dentists.

I would heartfully thank Dr.Anil for the support and wonderful treatment that he offered which made my root canal treatment successful with out any pain nor discomfort.
I would recommend Dr.Anil and Idental to all those who have dental problems or want a thorough evaluation done. Believe me! This place and Dr.Anil are just amazing!.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited clinic for dental cleaning. Extremely happy for support I received in the clinic. Dr Anil Kumar garu is excellent dentist and explained well. I strongly recommend this clinic for all dental problems. Very supportive staff at the clinic. Many thanks for the Idental clinic

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Professional Doctors - suggests only what is needed as part of treatment. 

I truely appreciate their service. The way Dr. Anil and the other Lady doctor ( sorry missed your name ) explained about the treatment very clearly which made me felt i came to the right dental clinic though it was my second visit in 4 years. 

I would Highly recommend iDental.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: At the outset I thank Dr. Anil Kumar Reddy. K and his team profusely for being attentive, informative, kind and highly supportive and for the incredible delicate care  and putting me at ease. I very much appreciate everything you have done for me! You speak with such a gentle voice , concern and acted with skill and wisdom. I strongly believe you always go above and beyond and work tirelessly towards a healthy outcome. I feel so blessed to know you and have you as my doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I went to the clinic due to heavy pain in the teeth. Dr Anil explained me the issues & solved all my queries. Dr suggested me for RCT and the entire cleaning process followed by a cap went very smooth. The lady Dr who treated me was so good in her profession that I did not feel any pain. The entire staff is very friendly and helpful. They maintain good hygiene and take all precautions related to COVID in the clinic. I will highly recommend iDental clinic for the treatment.¬†

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor was very Empathetic , very patient in explaining the codition and given very clear over view of the treatment plan and the clinic was following very good SOPs as far as Covid 19 is concerned , over all i felt it is the best possible option available in the area.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: After reading so many positive reviews we went to get our daughter's braces treatment done here. It went by very smoothly. Monthly appointments were properly initiated beforehand. We got to clear doubts if we had any, throughout the procedure too, and they were clarified. Dr. Anil Kumar Reddy sir was composed and always explained in a very informative and simplified way and gave us various options that we can look into if we had any hesitation, altogether he was pleasant and friendly. The staff was friendly and helpful too. Especially in the tough COVID times, the whole atmosphere was very well-maintained, precautions were taken to be safe. Our experience here was neat and we were satisfied.
